description_appended.description: extra characters appended to the *description* field.

vendor_removed.description: The *vendor* from the offer, which is missing in the invoice

msat.description: the amount, if different from the offer amount multiplied by any *quantity* (or the offer had no amount, or was not in BTC).

next_period.description: Only for recurring invoices if the next period is under the *recurrence_limit*

counter.description: the index of the next period to fetchinvoice

starttime.description: UNIX timestamp that the next period starts

endtime.description: UNIX timestamp that the next period ends

paywindow_start.description: UNIX timestamp of the earliest time that the next invoice can be fetched

paywindow_end.description: UNIX timestamp of the latest time that the next invoice can be fetched
